title: Adc looking for support
body:
Im currently silver 5, doing leg day. Looking for a support to duo in ranked. hit me up here or add me in game
i play Vayne most of the time but also play Lucian, Draven and Cait as back ups, ashe is my back up to back ups :P
thanks 
Squats

replies.body:
wow dude i am looking for a adc
{{champion:14}}  support sion main btw
Hey bud.. Not alot of champs i dont play, bot lane main both adc and support feel free to hit me up IGN- Tough

Im game. 
Mainly play Rakan lately, but play a beast as Leona. 
But I can play anyone as a support :D

Hi,I can play Zyra and BlitzCrank (Definitely better at Zyra),Also in S5.

Add Me: IGN-ShadowAqaurius.
add me. IGN: linkmoonshadow. Play mostly lulu, but also can play alistar, soraka, morgana
